    # Welcome to the Aurora Wiki!

    # Need some help? We've got your back

    If you're a newcomer or have any questions, please read FAQs before issuing problems on GitLab or asking for help in the Telegram support chat.

    If you're interested in the timeline and future development of Aurora apps, read the Roadmap page to know more!

    Other than that, indulge yourself with a good helping of docs.
